ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.modes

Class AcroModeLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.modes.ModeLogicBase
      • ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.modes.AcroModeLogic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFlightModeLogic

    public class AcroModeLogic
extends ModeLogicBase
    Parameter Updating Logic for AcroMode: We just forward the input to the corresponding output control. E.g. The YAW is forwarded to update the RUDDER parameter value. The rudder output device is subscribing to the RUDDER parameter and forwards any changes to the defined output pin (with a PWM signal)
    Author:
    pschatzmann
